extensionDescription.message: Firefox 中的兩步驟驗證器，可自動填入兩步驟驗證碼，且支援 Firefox Android 版

confirm.description: Confirm button text before account deleted

none.description: Displayed when no Container is assigned

submit.description: Submit form content as a new account

reset.description: Reset form to its initial status

export.description: Export all data to your disk

sure.description: Sure button text before action taken

cancel.description: Cancel button text before action taken

label_assign_container.description: Current Container which the account assigned onto

label_issuer.description: The site from which generates OTP secret key

label_algorithm.description: Hash algorithm used to manipulate Secret Tokens

label_algorithm_time.description: OTP type that based on time

label_algorithm_counter.description: OTP type that based on counter

about_acknowledgement_thanks_to_helpers.message: 特別感謝 💖 下列在項目建構當中作出貢獻的第三方：

about_acknowledgement_helper_first.message: Mozilla 的 Photon Design 設計文件 與 相關圖示資源

about_acknowledgement_helper_second.message: QRScaner QR Code 處理 JSOTP TOTP 生成算法

about_acknowledgement_helper_third.message: Authenticator 與 Yubioath Desktop 當中的特性啟發

about_acknowledgement_helper_fourth.message: Firefox Send 當中的加密程式碼 & js-base64 base64 編碼算法

about_acknowledgement_helper_fifth.message: Violentmonkey Dropbox API 操作算法

about_acknowledgement_logo.message: EYHN 圖示設計

about_acknowledgement_helper_last.message: 其他幫助打造項目的第三方與智囊

about_respected_RFC.message: TOTP 驗證碼算法源自於 RFC 6238

about_license.message: 除非另外明確聲明，否則本項目協議均為 GNU General Public License 3.0
